statements: DELETE FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_id = 1 AND product_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_id = 100 AND aisle_capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM Warehouse WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Product WHERE quantity < 10 AND category = 'Electronics';

DELETE FROM product WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM product WHERE category_id = 1)
